Screenwriter: Volker Schlöndorff, Margarethe von Trotta, Heinrich Böll
Production Co: Westdeutscher Rundfunk, Paramount-Orion Filmproduktion [de], Bioskop Film
Synopsis: After a chance encounter with a wanted man, a woman is harassed by the police and press until she takes violent action.
Title: The Lost Honor of Katharina Blum
